siteMetadata.title: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.author: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.description: I am a product manager, developer and designer from France. Co-founder of Pixelnest Studio.

markdownRemark.html:
Marco Arment:

I offered to give my Nexus 7 and Kindle Fire to Betaworks in the Instapaper acquisition, but they had so many of both sitting around already that they declined. Tech companies with mobile apps can practically tile walls with outdated Android devices. They’re the new AOL CDs.

excerptQuote.name: Marco Arment
excerptQuote.quote: Tech companies with mobile apps can practically tile walls with outdated Android devices. They’re the new AOL CDs.
